[/color][b][i][b][i][b][i][b][i][b][i][b][b]
[/b][i]REQUISITOS / [color=#00ff00]Requiriment [/color][/i][/b][/i][/b][/i][/b][/i][/b][/i][/b][/i][/b][/b][/i][/b][/i][/b][/b][/i][/b][/i][/b]

[color=#ff0000][size=4][u]>>>Dragonborn DLC<<<[/u]

[b][i][u][color=#ff0000]Update Realizado em 01/11/2017
Update realized in 01/11/2017[/color][/u][/i][/b][/size][/color]
[b][i][u][b][i][b][u][i][b][i][b][i][u][b][i][b][u][i][b][b][i][b][u][i][b][b]

[size=6][youtube]5z-HbgzAS0o[/youtube][/size]
[/b][/b][/i][/u][/b][/i][/b][/b][/i][/u][/b][/i][/b][size=3]
[b][i][b][u][i][b][i][b][i][u][b][i][b][u][i][b][i][b][i][u][b][i][b][i][u]Como conseguir o feitiço? / [color=#00ff00]How to get the spell?[/color]
[/u][/i][/b][/i][/b][/u][/i][/b][/i][/b][/i][/u][/b][/i][/b][/u][/i][/b][/i][/b][/i][/u][/b][/i][/b][/size][/u][/i][/b][/i][/b][/i][/u][/b][/i][/b][/u][/i][/b][u][size=3]
[b][i]Mate Miraak na garganta do Mundo e pegue os feitiços[/i][/b]
[/size][b][i][b][u][i][b][b][i][b][u][i][b][b][i][u][b][i][b][u][i][b][i][b][i][u][color=#00ff00][size=3]Kill Miraak in The World Throat and take the spells[/size][/color]
[/u][/i][/b][/i][/b][/i][/u][/b][/i][/b][/u][/i][/b][/b][/i][/u][/b][/i][/b][/b][/i][/u][/b][/i][/b][/u][b][i][b][size=5][u][i][b][b][i][b][size=5][u][i][b][b]________________________________________________________________[/b][/b][/i][/u][/size][/b][/i][/b][/b][/i][/u][/size][/b][/i][/b]

[b][i][b][i] As Magias Antigas - [/i][/b][color=#00ff00]The Elder Spells
[/color]
Quatro novas magias de quando Miraak dominava Skyrim
[color=#00ff00]Four new spells when Miraak dominated Skyrim
[/color]
Veja abaixo / [color=#00ff00]See[/color]:

A Paralisia de Mora (Poder) / [color=#00ff00]The Paralysis Of Mora (Power)[/color]
[b][i][b][size=5][u][i][b]________________________________________________________________[/b][/i][/u][/size][/b][/i][/b]

Dovahkiin Antigo / [color=#00ff00]Elder Dovahkiin[/color]

[color=#f4f4f4]Conjura antigo Dovahkiin para lutar ao seu lado por alguns segundos. Por 5 almas de dragão você pode conjurar outro Dovahkiin involuntariamente.[/color]
[color=#00ff00]Conjure Ancient Dovahkiin to fight at your side for a few seconds. For 5 dragon souls you can cast another Dovahkiin unintentionally.[/color]
[b][i][b][i][b][size=5][u][i][b]________________________________________________________________[/b][/i][/u][/size][/b][/i][/b][/i][/b][b][i][b]

[/b][/i][/b]A Tempestade do Dragão / [color=#00ff00]Dragon Storm[/color]
[color=#f4f4f4]
[size=2]Enquanto se concentra, o jogador conjura 2 dragões aspectrais por alguns segundos. Você pode invocar mais 1 aspectro por 5 almas de dragão. Para manter os dragões vivos você deve continuar se concentrando.[/size][/color][size=2]
[color=#00ff00]While concentrating, the player conjures 2 aspectral dragons for few seconds. You can summon 1 more aspect by 5 dragon souls. To keep the dragons alive you must continue to concentrate.[/color][/size]
[b][i][u][b][/b][/u][/i][/b][b][i][b][i][b][i][b][size=5][u][i][b]________________________________________________________________[/b][/i][/u][/size][/b][/i][/b][/i][/b][/i][/b]

A Maldiçao De Mora / [color=#00ff00]The Curse Of Mora[/color]

[size=2][color=#f4f4f4]Infecta o inimigo por alguns segundos. Os demais adversários que estejam ao alcance têm a possibilidade de se infectarem.[/color]
[/size][size=2][color=#00ff00]Infects the enemy for a few seconds. Other opponents within reach have the possibility of becoming infected.[/color]
[b][i][b][i][b][i][b][i][b][color=#f4f4f4][size=5][u][i][b]________________________________________________________________[/b][/i][/u][/size][/color][/b][/i][/b][/i][/b][/i][/b][/i][/b][/size]
[/i][/b]
[i][b]A presa de Mora / [color=#00ff00]T[/color][color=#00ff00]he prey of Mora[/color]
[color=#f4f4f4]
Os alvos ficam paralisados entre Oblivion e Tamriel durante alguns segundos, o que os faz imune a danos.[/color]
[color=#00ff00]The targets are paralyzed between Oblivion and Tamriel for a few seconds, which makes them immune to damage.[/color]
[/b][/i][/center]
author: Darkmano
